website_summaries.verdict: This safe gives you options with both combination and key entry. There is plenty of space for documents, DVDs, and USB drives.
pros: Can remain closed after enduring a 15 ft. fall
Locks with preset dial combination and secondary locking key
cons: Locking mechanism may fail over time, so open periodically to keep it in good working order

customer_reviews.title: This safe survived the camp fire in Cali!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a while since I bought this safe, but I have to share this. I bought this safe over a year ago for emergencies and to keep all my important documents safe. My family just survived the campfire in Paradise California and this safe survived! All my documents were in tact and even cash inside totally fine! I will 100% repurchase this safe and recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Door held by 1 bolt!
customer_reviews.text: Received on March 7, 2018 and the battery compartment was damaged. I contacted SentrySafe and they sent out a replacement compartment. I opened the safe to have the door fall off. There was only 1 bolt holding the door to the frame. I contacted SentrySafe and have yet to receive a response. I'm returning and will look at the competition. I'm not sure how this even made it beyond quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Little

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Safe won't open - my passport, birth certificate, everything of value is inside. Key and combination both don't work. Door is jammed. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy lock construction keeps you from your valuables
customer_reviews.text: Lock was very poorly made. Way too much play in mechanism. Only able to get it open about 4 times out of over 50 tries and my wife never could get it open. Glad we did not put valuables into it. Afterwards talked to 2 different local locksmiths who both said the sentry safes are easy for thrives to bust into but homeowners often end up calling them(the locksmiths) to get into their own malfunctioning safe.
customer_reviews.author: user725

customer_reviews.title: Safe will not open even with correct code
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year this safe will not open even after putting in the correct code. We were able to open it after repeated attempts yesterday but today it will not open. The light turns green indicating you can proceed to open the safe but the handle does not move and the door will not open. Since being able to open a safe you have stored valuable items in is important I recommend you consider a brand other than Sentry for your safe needs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Voelk

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package we discovered that it was damaged. Multiple dings and dents and a return slip was inside which tells me that somebody returned it previously.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, but mine came with some damage on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, but mine came with some damage on the side (looks like from the shipper). Lock box inside seems cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: RussT

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical after reading the negative review's, but this safe is great.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the negative review's I was a bit skeptical at first. But I took a chance and was pleasantly surprised. Safe arrived in perfect condition. Not one dent, bump or scratch. It was locked with keys, mounting screws and shelf/drawer inside. Manuel with code was inside box with safe. I love it. It meets all my needs. My only complaint's are the handle is plastic and the shelf/drawer isn't very sturdy. It has 3 purposes. To literally lock into the safe via lock and key, store things internally, and act as a shelf. If you're wanting a go box, I'd recommend a chest instead. But other than that I'm satisfied. Great safe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Figured if I get another 8 years out of this one then I'll b fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works for now, Let's see for how long this time... Last one I had died after about 8 years. Looked up a bunch of things online about the problem that everyone seems to be having with SentrySafe. Found it to be essentially unfixable. Still I decided to go with the same safe simply because of the exterior dimensions. Figured if I get another 8 years out of this one then I'll b fine.
customer_reviews.author: SYLWIA

customer_reviews.title: Key and Passcode Combo not well thought out
customer_reviews.text: It is fine in many respects but, for some reason, they skimped on the handle...it is plastic and you can feel it flex when you turn it to open it. Another failure is that you cant change the original code to open it...you can add codes, but the factory one stays. So if that kind of defeats the ability to change your password...sure, if you lock it with the key, then none of the passcodes will open the safe, but I dont want to rely on the key. This key-passcode function was something that I did not learn when I read the reviews, so I thought I would share it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space inside this safe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size safe if you have many things to use it with. Even has keyholders and a pocket on the inside of the door for quick easy to find items. Also has an adjustable pull out shelf and an adjustable pull out drawer. Very easy to drill through the bottom feet, in order to anchor it to the floor. Mine only had one indention in the center of one foot for drilling. No problem to tap an indention for drilling holes. Definitely a good quality safe. No question thieves will have a difficult time, trying to steal this one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Locks and Doesn't open
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months the lock stopped turning and the handled didn't work...locking everything inside. Once we did get it open it wouldn't lock again. Unfortunately we've been told because it's been longer than 30 days the safe is no longer covered for defects. Expensive lesson - find a company that stands behind the quality of the items they sell. Can Not express more that is is a cheap product... do not put valuables in it... as you may never get them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great safe
customer_reviews.text: Once our bank started charging for safe deposit boxes, we found this safe to take its place. I did not want push button, batteries going dead, etc. The old fashioned tried and true dial fit the bill. This is easy to open, easy to lock and a great size for important papers and a few valuables. We have had it for over a year and will have it for years to come...
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Craig Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love the water/fire proof safe!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy about the purchase! *It is of the right size and fits nicely into my closet. * The safe locks and unlocks flawlessly. * It came unexpectedly fast and undamaged. * I read the reviews extensively before the purchase and followed the advice of some reviewers. To avoid moisture, I put quite a bit of desiccant in the safe, and sealed the documents in heavy duty plastic bags. Everything turns out fine so far. * A fire broke out in our apartment building a couple of weeks ago. Fortunately, the fire was contained to one apartment, not adjacent to mine. This safe gave me a peaceful mind at that moment; my important documents are in a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Ann  X

customer_reviews.title: For $200 find something else do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I've had this not more than two weeks I only mess with it for the first couple of days just to see how it works the unit is not opening batteries are not working and it keeps giving me glitches and errors and I have a lot of important stuff inside my safe now
customer_reviews.author: vladi K

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy lock Mechanism
customer_reviews.text: The lock Mechanism is flimsy. With all the weight this has, you'd think the lock Mechanism would be metal, but it feels like it's flimsy plastic. We were able to open it maybe 10% of the time. THE KEY INCLUDED! We were afraid we wouldn't get our valuables out, but we kept trying. After 30 minutes on hold for Sentry Safe, they walked us through the steps, to no avail. They recommended we return the safe, which we did. The flimsy plastic-feeling lock mech was a disappointment. The rest of the safe seemed substantial, but it seems like they cheaped out on the most important part. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Safe Measurements are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE. This safe is quite larger than the measurements listed on Amazon. If your space where you store this safe is very specific then do not trust the measurements listed. I had to make major changes to my space to fit this safe, extra time and expenses were involved of course. Don't get me wrong, its a good safe but listing wrong product information on "Amazon", where shopping according to "SPECIFICATIONS" & "MEASUREMENTS" for many items is crucial, is becoming very concerning. I've had similar experiences with some other products recently as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: I should’ve saved $40 bucks
customer_reviews.text: The safe was great, came quickly and in great shape. The only issue I have is that, I thought the supplied key was for backup, in case you forgot the combination. It’s a two step process (if you want to use the key). You move the key to the unlocked position, remove it, then you key your combination. Once in the unlocked position, it can be left there, at that point there’s no need for the key. That’s a waste of $39 bucks for me personally, because I don’t need the duel protection. But the damn thing is too heavy to be playing switcheroo. So I’ll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty. and durable quality.
customer_reviews.text: The bins would have been better if they we're shelves. It was packaged really good to avoid damage. Was concerned that the pass code was one of theirs and could not be changed, however you could add a second pass code of your own to go with theirs . I like the added key function. Item is very heavy for one person to get in the house by one person (I managed). Hard to get out of the box, just a little thought I got it out. Bolting down hardware included. All in all I think it is a great value, however it was cheaper on eBay after I purchased it on Amazon. Hard to locate model and serial number.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Won't Always Unlock
customer_reviews.text: The electronic keeypad is starting to not work right after two and a half weeks of owning this. After punching in the combination, the lights dim out and the safe won't unlock; even with a fresh set of batteries. Save your money and get the old fashioned dial safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good home safe
customer_reviews.text: Got this safe today. As others said, it came slightly damaged (ding on one of the bottom corners). Nothing too major, but still disappointing that it was not packed better. The safe is extremely heavy (>85 lbs.) and seems well made. Took 10 minutes to install batteries and to follow the user manual to add my own code and turn the light on inside. As others have also said, there is no way to remove the factory code, which is annoying. I like that the safe is fire and water proof. I trust that it will do a good job securing my valuables. We will see. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not burglar proof
customer_reviews.text: Boy do I feel like a chump. After 250 USD spent, several hours doing a secure install, I see a guy on u tube take an off the shelf circular saw and cut in half MY MODEL safe in less than two minutes. Because the bloody thing was SO HEAVY I figured the outside steel casing was at least 1/4 or 3/8 inch thick. Well guess again, it's sheet metal, the saw went thru it like hot butter. Guess there's still a sucker born every minute.
customer_reviews.author: vernon reed

customer_reviews.title: Not actually a safe.
customer_reviews.text: Safe has a dent and seam bulge on the back. It is not air and water tight. There is no damage to the factory box. Here again is Masterlock and their Chinese supplier. It certainly is not sledge hammer proof. I'll keep it. It is probably good enough for my needs and very heavy to be hauling back to UPS for fun. But I certainly will not be buying any Masterlock products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Safe with Adjustable Box Shelf
customer_reviews.text: The safe is easy to initially use. I love the inside drawer which is adjustable to allow more space either above or below. The keypad is easy to use and the lock provides extra security. There is a small pocket on the door that adds extra room as well. Love that this safe has four locking mechanisms and is also available in a dial form as well. It also comes with heavy anchors for added security. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This safe appears to be super secure. Combination works smoothly. The safe, being waterproof does not open as smoothly as my old key pad safe did, so after turning the combination press firmly on the handle. Read enclosed information. The safe had 3 moisture absorbing packets which would be helpful to continue using. Otherwise, open the safe once in a while to let air in. Interior side walls have grooves top to bottom for plenty of shelf adjustments. I had initially contacted Sentry customer service for what I thought was an issue. They were helpful and patient. Very satisfied with safe and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Great Electronic Keypad Safe
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all the fuss is about on the electronic keypad. Works great and so much better than trying to turn the dial back and forth using the manual dial version. How 18th century. So far we love the safe. It is everything we expected. Is it the most secure safe in the world? Probably not, but we were more interested in protection from fire and water damage than someone stealing the safe or breaking into it. Our attach dogs will tear them to shreds way before they get near the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in NJ

customer_reviews.title: So Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I am totally bummed about this safe. It arrived damaged. See pics. Sadly, I routinely order a lot of products and it seems to me receiving damaged products is the “new norm” which is immensely frustrating. There really no recourse to resolve this matter. The safe is very heavy and impossible to ship back. I am simply stuck with a defective product. I wonder if anyone really gives a crap about customer satisfaction and product care. It is like finding a large dent on a car you just bought, but have not yet drove it away from the dealer. This bites...
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Platt

customer_reviews.title: Nor worth buying!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the safe and when I didn't see no damage to the box, I opened the box and removed the foam protector from the edges (the foam was in one piece) but once I removed I noticed the damage to the safe top left/back side and some on the right side too. I wish I could upload a picture because I feel that it was shipped like this. The worse part is that I broughted to my room in the second floor and now I need to bring it back, loaded and take it thi UPS to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with no manual, so we cannot open it!
customer_reviews.text: I might rate this safe much higher if we could actually use it, but it arrived with no manual and therefore no code to open it. We looked up the manual online, but the sticker that is supposed to be on the back with the code to open it is obviously not included. Now to figure out how to get support to solve this problem. Definitely falls into the category of things that should be easy never are.
customer_reviews.author: GLK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Just got this thing, so cannot speak about the longevity of it. However please read the dimensions to manage your expectations. The safe seems to be pretty secure based on the two locking mechanism. Love the extra secure box on the inside. The size is just about what need to fit right under my working desk.Its a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R G

customer_reviews.title: Don't follow directions on front of safe to "scan"
customer_reviews.text: My safe arrived in good condition. However, the front of the safe has a barcode and wants you to scan it with your phone. I did, then followed the site to "how to open the safe". It told me my safe code is ".........". I tried to open that safe ALL DAY using that code - only to find out that the code on the back of the instructions IS correct NOT what the scanned directions tried to tell me. That's why I am giving this only a 4. I would not have spent all that time if that video had not tried to tell me to use a different code.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Safe, thinking about getting another one.
customer_reviews.text: Great Safe, just make sure you get good batteries or you might b in a bad situation although it apparently warns you when they're running low. I was easily able to setup a code for myself and my wife. It has kooks on the inside to hang keys plus an extra locked drawer to secure documents.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe, Combo Dial can Melt
customer_reviews.text: So I love this safe, and definitely feel securely about the contents within. My only concern is that the spindle dial is made of plastic, so, in the event of a fire, getting into your documents afterwards will be a bit tricky. I'm sure that the manufacturer has ways around it, and they even offer to replace the safe after a fire, which is great. But it would give me better peace of mind to know that the whole thing can't melt in a fire.
customer_reviews.author: J. Steinbrecher

customer_reviews.title: Only get this for the fire rating, don't trust it to prevent any theft at all.
customer_reviews.text: The keypad was extremely easy to remove and tamper, i believe i even see the coil control wires that can be used to open the safe is the key is not used. The key does not actually open the safe, it is meant as a secondary lock, so even with the code you can't open the handle. That said it is a barrel type. The keypad seems to have a screw hole in the bottom but apparently the QC department was asleep and there is no screw preventing you from removing the keypad, not that it would prevent someone front just taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Ferny

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long!
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe, and can't believe I waited so long. This is the perfect safe for storing your stuff you want safe!! From the door light when you open the safe to the locking drawer this is a practical safe. Lock out with a key for when your going to be gone for a period of time is a nice piece of mind. If your in the market for a safe worth the money then this is the one for you! Also this the size where you have room to store your stuff and not feel like you went to big or to small. It's just right!!!
customer_reviews.author: BIG DADDY

customer_reviews.title: Your secure
customer_reviews.text: Great safe for your home. Once you have loaded it up with your needs, no one is going to remove it from your home, unless they bring two guys. NO ONE is going to carry it out by themselves. I also can't see it being lost in a fire or the contents inside. Only thing is, the key can't be removed with it in lock. I have one from years ago and you can remove the key after unlocking it, you just have to push the button to relock. With this one you have to push the button with key in it, then remove the key. I'm just a little picky.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: High moisture interior, most open and replenish desiccant
customer_reviews.text: interesting, it will work...but you have to be slow with the dial, as if you try to dial rapidly, the gears don't mesh and you wind up failing to open the safe....and the warning of safe occupants that are susceptible to moisture.... It IS pretty sturdy, solid bolts, not so sure about the "airtight" as it is just weather stripping you would find on a window ( not neoprene...just closed cell foam and not even a solid piece...cut and paste) At least I can keep dishonest people out of it...as for a fire or flood....got lots of pictures of the stuff placed in the safe, you know just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggy

customer_reviews.title: great, not grrrRRRREAT!
customer_reviews.text: pretty good. periodically, the mechanism sticks and won't actuate/open upon entering the code...even the correct code. i know you're sure you did, and it's not due to dead batteries! you need to take your rubber mallet to the door several times (with purpose friends, don't hold back) until you hear something happen. then, you can proceed as usual. have had to do this twice now. once with a neighborhood fundraiser waiting at the door after i promised to contribute, haha. was surprised at the capacity. you can put more in this than you think!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Sucks
customer_reviews.text: I can tell this is a cheap ass safe. I didnt by it for burglary, i kill burglars. I bought it for fire, guns dont work against fire. Its cheaply made and I feel like a 8-year-old could get into it with a toy construction worker set but if this works against fire thats all I care about. I could test it, but I dont want to burn down my house to see if the safe works. However that would put my mind at ease and I am a little stressed right now so maybe I should?
customer_reviews.author: Maxter50

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packed with interior Styrofoam edges and entire bottom
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the safe and unpacked it. Nicely packed with interior Styrofoam edges and entire bottom. When I removed the edges a ugly ding in the top left corner. Now the box was not damaged or were the edges inside so this ding had to have happened at the factory and either no one noticed or someone didn't care. Other than that the safe is ok the out side handle is a little flimsy but for the price I guess it goes without saying you pay for what you get. I only hope the ding in the edge of the corned dosen't effect the fire rating.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Gill

customer_reviews.title: Will keep nothing safe!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look online you can open this in 5 seconds with a magnet. It’s an expensive paper weight. Not a safe at all and shouldn’t be sold because of it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: functioned flawlessly / arrived with cosmetic damages
customer_reviews.text: Safe arrive ahead of schedule, functioned flawlessly and was easy to program access codes ( can have two personnel along with the master code that it comes with). Mine had the secondary keyed lock. Based on the pin locking into plastic and the hinge being outside if someone wanted to break in I believe it would be easy . It will work for my desire to store important records that will be safe from fire or water. knocked down 1 star as safe came with 2 flaws like it had been poked thru box or dropped. don't know if it was thru UPS or at the vendors.
customer_reviews.author: johnofos104

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The safe arrived damaged!! Two corners are visibly dented. It looked like it might have been dropped or could have been used. Now I don't know if I can trust the inner working/gears of the safe. Would it still be waterproof and firesafe. This is very frustrating as it's a very heavy item and there is no way I can return it. Very disappointed with Amazon. They clearly did not do any quality control testing prior to sending out the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Stargal

customer_reviews.title: Havw professionals deliver this to your home or office
customer_reviews.text: Safe looks to be pretty solid, I highly recommend staying away from having this delivered as it is clearly to heavy of an item to be thrown around in trucks. Never even opened inside because the casing and box it arrived in was so badly damaged that it doesn’t matter what the inside looks like at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Terri

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received it today. Carried the 90lb safe up 2 flights of stairs. Opened up the box. Pit batteries in and NOTHING!!! Called company and they said it must be a malfunction with the digital dial. Told me to contact amazon to rerun for a replacement. So I carried it back down 2 flights of stairs and to my truck to lug it all the way to ups to ship it back. Waiting for a replacement. For a $190 safe this should not have happened!! I’m completely frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Barman6573

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This safe replaced a similar Sentry safe that I purchased years ago and seems like quite an upgrade as far as features and ease of use go. The safe arrived earlier than I expected, and in perfect condition, to the credit of the seller. Besides these, I was very pleased with the price which, I notice, has increased 10% since my safe was delivered just 4 days ago. So, if this safe serves me as reliably as the one I purchased years ago, I will be very pleased. So far, I am satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good quality safe for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Like the safe's appearance and quality of construction. We got the manual combination model so we don't have to worry about replacing batteries to make the lock work. It weighs about 125lbs. which is good but we don't plan on moving it much. Is bigger in real life than we thought it would be, by the picture in the AD. Fire proof and water proof protection for important papers and other valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Nealey

customer_reviews.title: 3 Arrived with DENTS. Nice safe otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Three safes ALL delivered with moderate to large dents!!!! Amazon or their shipping damaged all three. Two I purchased through amazon and one was a replacement for the first one that came dented. The safe is great. Nicely built, excellent seal and good size for home. Easily movable with a dolly but heavy enough (140lbs) to deter a grab and dash theft. You can bolt it to the ground if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Good Price but Cheap Handle and Materials
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the handle on this safe is such low quality plastic. Not even solid plastic but the 'hollowed out' type that bends as you apply pressure. This is a safe and in the event of a fire that would be the first thing to melt making getting your contents out extremely difficult. Other finishes are good, the plastic interior is real flimsy but gets the job done. SentrySafe used to have impeccable products. They need to address this handle issue.
customer_reviews.author: CHZ

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: If you drill holes in the safe to secure it to a floor it is no longer watertight. Very interesting information that didn't come to our attention until the safe was delivered. It appears to be an average safe, but the watertight feature was one of the reasons we bought it and If you have a safe, surely you want it secured to the floor! Very puzzling, but wanted potential buyers to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: after just a few months of being opened once every few days, the digital unlock has stopped working. can't get the safe open. batteries are brand new, the safe makes noise like its unlocking, but stays latched. I've done searches online to find this is a common issue with their digital combo safes. id recommend getting an old style turn knob unlock with key backup. other than that, the safe is built well, and would have been nice if it still opened.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is JUNK. I read the reviews and thought there must be good ones and bad ones out there. Guess what....I got a bad one. Just opened the box and the hinge on the door has a crack running down the entire length of the hinge. Don’t take my word for it, look at the pictures. Return period has expired, so I am stuck with this junk. Don’t make the same mistake I did!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Security, fire and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice safe and I like the fact that it's fire and waterproof, but I gave it a 3 star because it came with dents. I didn't send it back because I'm afraid that I will end up with another one that has worse dents. I debated on giving 2 or 3 stars because I am very unhappy with the fact that it has dents. I seen worse dents on some of the reviews so that is why I didn't want to send it back and that helped me make my decision for the 3 stars. I didn't pay for a scratch and dent product so it should not come with dents.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build But Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to house the collection of coins i am building for my children. Overall i am happy with the size and operation of this safe. My only complaint is damage to the outside during shipping. It will undoubtedly make it less fire/water resistant. However, i was not willing to ship it back for the dame done. If you buy this you should expect some cosmetic damage but the product is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery J.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the less than great reviews I was hesitant in ordering this. But how hard can it be to open a combination safe? Worked first time and every time since. You kinda need to be quick about it, but I find that a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Read manufactures recommended use carefully!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lock is plastic along with handle. Not really liking product so far. It has a foam inside that retains moisture so manufacturer recommends no jewelry be kept in it. Has key but doesn’t open separately without combo. Heavy and will be pain to send back so trying it out for now. Packaged poorly with broken styrofoam everywhere! Big mess to clean up! Not sure if it’s the right fit for me?
customer_reviews.author: Bea River

customer_reviews.title: Safe arrives with lots of damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product it self is a good product. The safe has a good interior space and it is heavy. Good quality overall. The reason for 2 stars is the same as many other review the safe arrived all damaged with dents and scratches on the edges like it had been drop I ask for a replacement and I am waiting to see what will be the condition of the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Solid Safe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and solid. Some have complained about the plastic parts - they are only the handle and dial - they have NOTHING to do with the hinges or locking mechanisms which are all metal. I have it mainly for fire/water protection so I have not bolted it to the floor, but the hardware sent would make it easy to do. The directions included are clear and easy to follow. The dial feels smooth, and once unlocked the door is easy to open. The plastic tray on the inside is not the sturdiest, but that doesn't matter to me. Mainly using just to keep documents safe.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Main purpose was for document protection from fire and water damage from firemen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this safe for personal use in my single level residence. It’s selling feature for me was being fire and water proof. I want to protect personal paperwork and documents from a possible house fire and firemen with tons of water. Cost was very acceptable. The safe is heavy enough that it would be difficult for a thief to haul away by hand without spending more time than a regular burglary takes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great first safe.
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to figure out how to input the combination at first. If the handle is not pushed up as far as it can go the dial does not spin freely. It almoat feels like turning it will break it. The actual plastic handle seems a little weak. Could be mosre solid. It flexes a bit. I also wish it had more than just one shelf but thats just me. Over all i am happy. I have not secured it to the floor yet, it seems as though you need to drill through the pilot holes from the outside bottom. There are no holes inside. Just as an fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ... the second floor had to use a hand truck love the fact that it's fire proof I had bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Very big a lot bigger than I had expected and very very heavy especially considering I live on the second floor had to use a hand truck love the fact that it's fire proof I had bought this to store my prescription medication in because it was disappearing and I wasn't taking it this should more that do the trick after seeing how big it is I will be storing atleast a photo album and a few other odds and ends this is a very good safe I would recommend it to any one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sentry Safe
customer_reviews.text: arrived 2 days early, and completely undamaged. This thing is heavy. READ THE DIRECTIONS, its very easy to use if you Follow THE INSTRUCTIONS. Very happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Fire proof or crush proof
customer_reviews.text: Fire proof or crush proof? I don't know. I just got it delivered on the driveway. Opened the box and found this. I'm too annoyed (Polite version) to open the safe to see if it is.... safe. Notice the little balls of styrofoam? It just was removed from the box. The spinning handle is plastic. Does plastic hold up to fires? My wife thinks the inside of the safe is a great size so hopefully the return policy is good.
customer_reviews.author: SUP for fun

customer_reviews.title: good condition, opened easily
customer_reviews.text: Several reviews that I read before ordering discussed damaged condition and inability to open the safe. While it was delivered to the wrong suite, my good neighbors brought the safe to my office. It was in very good condition. The safe required that I remove the battery cartridge and insert 4 AAA batteries (not included). I then reinserted the cartridge and entered the combination from a sticker on the back of the operator's manual. The safe opened easily. Keys were inside. I tested opening and closing several times. The seal for waterproof felt proper and there was no problem opening or closing. No problems with the combination, as others have stated.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: No pieces for inside and dented up!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and how easy to open. However in all the years I have shopped here on amazon I have never been soooo disappointed! It arrived dented all to pieces and none of the pieces for the inside was with it. My husband was so mad at me for ordering this safe. It was to big, to much hassle to send back so it's in the garage.... and I have a pissy husband!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in Jan., 2019. We were not able to get the PIN code to work for the safe so we decided to just use the key to open the safe. Now the key won't even work. We will have to somehow drill into the safe to get the items out that are inside. This product is obviously defective. Online says that "the window for returning is closed". I am totally dissatisfied with this product! I'm hoping that I will somehow be able to at least get my money back! Hopefully we can get into it by drilling.
customer_reviews.author: Millese

customer_reviews.title: Be ware, I thought the key was just an ...
customer_reviews.text: Be ware, I thought the key was just an override option if you could not or did not want to mess around with the combination portion, no, you need both they key AND the combination to open the safe up.
customer_reviews.author: Spiker0118

customer_reviews.title: Heavy safe and a nice size that can be stored in a large variety of places in a home.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the safe and was impressed with the customer service department. Had to call and get help getting into it at first, and the representative I spoke to was very helpful , informative, and patient with me as we worked through the initial opening process. Highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just received my safe yesterday. So far so good, my only complaint is that the key pad is not silent. If I ever had to reach for my weapon the intruder would hear me pressing buttons to open the safe whereas I would like to go unnoticed before filling him with holes🤷🏾‍♀️ Also you may want to add you own light inside of the safe because the only light it has is in the crack of the door once you open it, and that light is not bright enough and it doesn’t stay on long.
customer_reviews.author: Yesika

customer_reviews.title: Good safe
customer_reviews.text: I love this sentry safe. Its everything I wanted and looks great mounted on top of my gun safe. Only problem was my first safe that I recieved. To begin with it was about 3 days late. I was told that there was a problem that delayed my package and gave me a 5 dollar voucher for my next purchase. Then the safe arrived and as you can see in the last 2 pictures it was smashed and damaged either in shipping or at the warehouse. Amazon immediately shipped a replacement that arrived and they picked up the old one. Even gave me a 15 percent discount for the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Easy  to open and close
customer_reviews.text: This is a good safe - bigger than I thought although I had the measurements. Very easy to open and close. Dial is a little sloppy. BUT the safe had a damaged back corner - won't affect the functioning but shows disregard for handling. Package was not damaged. Manual is not the best. There are exclusions in what you can protect (in case of fire or flood) which is not mentioned in the online description. Also, there is no water damage protection if bolted to floor or wall. Maybe obvious but not stated in the online description. Registration link in the manual doesn't work. I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe, Arrived in Perfect Condition
customer_reviews.text: I held off ordering a safe for over a year because of the reviews of damage I kept reading. I finally took the chance and it arrived in pristine condition delivered by Amazon not UPS. The safe has plenty of space and the internal light is a helpful feature.
customer_reviews.author: EY1800

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy safe
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty impressed with this safe. I've had it for about a month and the lock works fine. The locked shelf inside is pretty flimsy but other than that it was a good purchase. It's even bigger than it looks in pictures. This is not fireproof but it is heavy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: B. Poynter

customer_reviews.title: Cheap handle and locked safe with no code
customer_reviews.text: Who sends a safe without a code and without documentation. Oh, and you can’t call support on the weekends. I received this today and have no owners manual and no way of getting in the safe. I talked to support and they were zero help. Do yourself a favor and buy another safe elsewhere. This is a complete joke! After seeing the bad reviews I should’ve know better. The handle on this safe is super cheap and will not last. I’m sending it back for a refund and I will purchase a different safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof if bolted down.
customer_reviews.text: Only dislike was locking drawer inside safe. It does not lock well and is useless. Also no moisture pads included although they should have been. But easy to bolt down because directions were good. However did not realize until I read directions in box that bolting this safe down voided the water proof feature. Hope I don’t have a flood!
customer_reviews.author: Carol McNeilage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sentry safe because I already had one other smaller Sentry safe and was pleased with it. I understand some other reviewers had some shipping damage, but I did not. It was securely packaged and there wasn't a thing wrong with it. It was actually roomier inside than I expected. I haven't yet secured it to my concrete floor, but Sentry included everything I need to do that, so I have no doubt that project will go well.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: If key pad doesn’t work, check battery box terminals. Should have about 6.5V DC.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was beat up pretty badly in shipping. Return and reorder was very simple and quickly accomplished. However, the key pad would not function. After determining that all four AA batteries were good, and after a lot of poking with a good digital volt meter, I found that one battery was not making contact on +end. Called customer service and they immediately shipped a new battery box. Same problem! I solved the problem by modifying the batt box with a dremel tool.
customer_reviews.author: ron smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I didnt do measurements when I ordered so when I received it I was in shock. I stared at it for 30 minutes and grew to love the size it is and made room for it. The keypad and the light inside makes it look so professional, the extra lock box inside is great for extra security and also works as a shelf for documents or other things. It even comes with bolts to screw it into place if you’d like. Very secure and easy to use. So happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use digital combination
customer_reviews.text: As in many of the comments mine also came with a crushed corner. However, it did not ruin the function of the safe and since it is in a hidden area of the house cosmetic effects don't matter. Is large enough to store folders of documents. The locking box shelf is ideal for locking up jewelry. The ease of the digital combinations means that my husband can open the lock himself (as opposed to our old dial combination that he couldn't quite make work). The digital numbers are large enough for someone with compromised sight to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: it sat in my closet for 6 months without being opened, handle broke internally, got it broken open and all my papers inside were mildewed. would not recommend ever
customer_reviews.author: W.C. Toans

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS SAFE
customer_reviews.text: COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY DO NOT PUT YOUR VALUABLES IN HERE! This safe does not open every time. I’ve had several times where I had to access this safe and could not get into it. I’m 100% certain I was using it correctly with the correct code. Scary when you have literally your most precious items in there and cannot gain access to them. Stay away!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic handle
customer_reviews.text: The safe is clearly a budget based unit so my expectations were not unrealistic. Unfortunately the lock handle ( the part that is used the most ) is made out of a relatively soft plastic and flexes with each use. Seems like a horrible and shameful choice of materials for a safe/lock handle. It doesn't give me much confidence that it will last.
customer_reviews.author: D Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy. Well built. Lock in front is just a lock out key.
customer_reviews.text: This seems pretty safe. This thing looks like a safe straight out of the game Payday. The locking mechanism works pretty well. The programming instructions are pretty straightforward. The only complaints I have are that the key that comes with it does not open the safe. It locks it so that not even the code works. Basically a lock out. The handle feels like it might break if you were to pull on it hard. And it’s heavy. Very heavy. A full grown man may have a difficult time lifting this. Other then that, very well built. I give this 4 out of 5 stars. The lock not being an actual lock is the 1 remaining star.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Valadez

customer_reviews.title: The key override is a great feature
customer_reviews.text: The key override acts like a safe deposit box where you need two "keys." So, I was able to give the digital combination to my daughter but she can't open it unless my sister provides the override key. And my sister can't open it unless she gets the combination from my daughter. So, it takes two people (in case of my demise) to open it. I got the 1.23 cubic feet model. It's a little bigger than I need just to keep some cash and some papers.
customer_reviews.author: crimsonkng

customer_reviews.title: Jusssst a lil bit heavy...
customer_reviews.text: Need to air it out for a week or two (I left it open for the first month). Solid, does what I need it to do (fireproof, deters all but the determined...etc). Hint: When it arrives the thing is, of course, very frickin heavy. I cut the box and dragged the safe across the box to where I wanted it to go. This did not include stairs. Lord (or at least three friends with good backs and bad lawyers) help you if you need this to go up or down the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this safe. It is heavy enough where no single person will carry it easily however it can be moved around by someone if necessary. The storage space inside is great, we now keep a bunch of documents and jewelry inside. I feel much more secure having the valuables inside here as compared to lying around in a drawer. We rent an apartment so I did not bolt it to the floor but intend to do so when we get a more permanent residence.
customer_reviews.author: Big Drunk Jedi

customer_reviews.title: GET WHAT WE PAID FOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a new Sentry Safe-thru Master Lock Co LLC. I paid for an TWO lock features TWO-not one. The safe did not come with the key for the second security system and when I called the reply was cordial BUT too bad we don't have any more of those keys so you cannot get one period!!! Floyd said a=call back in a couple of months...or return it. hello?? when do we get what we pay for????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid sense of security now
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, seems quite sturdy, zero issues with locking mechanisms. Very heavy and heavy duty. I like the mechanized-only option. Glad I finally made the purchase after reviewing lots of options. I feel I have made a good purchase and received the safe in great packaging and very timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanne

customer_reviews.title: Good safe for home use. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: A great safe for home use. Heavy enough, good lock, readily concealed. Great for papers, jewelry, and other important stuff. Recommend the additional shelf available on amazon for basically doubling space. I researched these pretty hard and this one had the best combination of size and ease of use for the money. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Beans

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: We got this safe to put in one of our smaller closets and it fits perfectly. We did get the locking drawer for it as well. It can hold quite a bit for its size with the drawer in there, too. We have some fireproof bags in there as well just in case and those fit well, larger one is a bit tight but still fits. Nice that we are able to program a changeable code if need be. Definitely a go-to choice for a smaller in-home safe if that's what you're looking for. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend the analog dial vs
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these at the office prior to buying one for our home. These safes are heavy and durable. I would definitely recommend the analog dial vs. the digital. We had the digital at work prior to buying the analog and the combination lock eventually fails. We ended up having to pry the safe open with a pry bar. (This happened on two different safes so I don't think it was a fluke.) The only thing I don't like about the safe is that you cannot set the combination yourself; it comes preset.
customer_reviews.author: BLinville

customer_reviews.title: I should have purchased the digital version
customer_reviews.text: It takes an actor of congress to get into this thing. Don't pack your gun in here because it will take too long in an emergency to get to it. You need a key and combo to open the lock. I had another safe and you could use a key or key pad to enter. I decided to save a few dollars in purchasing this but boy do I wish I had purchased the digital version. Also, you can NOT set your own combination.
customer_reviews.author: President & CEO

customer_reviews.title: Unable to open this safe, no key provided to follow instructions to do so.
customer_reviews.text: This safe either came locked and there isn't a key to unlock it or it is faulty as with no reasonable amount of strength will the door open. Adding batteries does absolutely nothing as the key pad doesn't light up with brand new batteries to give you confirmation that the code works. It is possible to turn the handle with pressure but there is absolutely no way to open the door. All of the videos on the sentrysafe website make this all seem like effortless actions, this is not the case with what I was delivered. I should have tested this before moving it up 2 flights of stairs as it is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Sentry Safe great product
customer_reviews.text: This safe is a great product. The fact of two key features to open the safe is good. The keypad and key is good and you cant open the safe without both... I would recommend adding an additional lock box as well. That one box is great but a 2nd lock box would increase sales.
customer_reviews.author: LaRosstin

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for firearms, watches and electronic equipment
customer_reviews.text: Page 2 of booklet No Firearms, computers, flashdrives and jewelry such as watches. The whole point of my safe was to store those objects.. thank god I didnt bring this safe to my room and opened it in the garage. Easy to repackage have it picked up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ebal24

customer_reviews.title: Works Great !
customer_reviews.text: Came undamaged, well packaged ,installed the batteries... no problems unlocking and locking. The Interior Light is a great feature ! The only thing you need to do is get a few silicone packs to keep away dampness like you have to do with all safes. I am so glad I didn't listen to the bad reviews on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J Rodenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and well built
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavy but that’s a good quality to have in a safe that’s rated to be fireproof. Plenty big. I have it on the ground in my closet. Doesn’t take up much room. Hopefully I never have to test it’s ability to be resistant to fire but if I do I have faith it will hold its own.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Can’t turn the dial
customer_reviews.text: Can’t do anything with this and it’s too late for a return. The dial won’t move I have tried several times and I can’t move the dial to open it, good thing is I have not put anything into it yet. Very bad quality and now I have a 60 pound brick I can’t do anything with.
customer_reviews.author: Linette Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: This safe is junk
customer_reviews.text: First of all I would give this safe zero stars if I could. When we unpacked it it had 3 dents in it. We installed the batteries as directed to open the safe, cause the keys are locked inside, and nothing. Opened a different pack of batteries and still nothing. The handle and the lock feature are very cheaply made of plastic. I should have listened to the other reviews on this safe and not purchased it anyway. I would not recommend this safe to anyone, don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: cupcakelover

customer_reviews.title: Built like a Tank!
customer_reviews.text: This a very nice safe. I purchased the non digital version incase of a power failure. It is air tight. You can hear it seal when shut. There is lots of room. A slide out storage drawer thats removable, document holder on the inside of the door and key ring holders. Its built like a tank and I think it could survive being hit by a semi going 88 mph.
customer_reviews.author: PETER R

product_meta.title: SentrySafe SFW123DSB Fireproof Safe and Waterproof Safe with Dial Combination 1.23 Cubic Feet Gray
product_meta.description: Style:1.23 cu ft Dial Combination| Pattern Name:SafeDesigned to protect your important documents, the SentrySafe SFW123DSB Fireproof Safe and Waterproof Safe protects documents, valuables, and digital media from fire, water, and theft. Ideal for your home and office security needs, featuring solid steel construction with a secondary locking key to provide additional protection from unwanted access.
feature_bullets: Fireproof safe is UL Classified to endure 1 hour at 1700°F and keep interior temperatures safe for irreplaceable documents, valuables, DVDs, and USBs; ETL Verified to withstand a 15 foot fall during a fire and remain closed
Waterproof safe is ETL Verified for 24 hours of protection in water up to 8 inches deep offering peace of mind in the event of a flood

Preset dial combination fire safe with secondary locking key for strong security; combination safe features four live-locking bolts, steel construction, pry-resistant hinge bar, shelf, and bolt down hardware
Exterior: 16.3 in. W x 19.3 in. D x 17.8 in. H; door requires 14.75 in. of clearance to fully open; Interior: 12.6 in. W x 11.9 in. D x 13.8 in. H; large 1.23 cubic foot capacity; weighs 86 pounds

Should your fireproof safe be damaged by fire or water, SentrySafe will provide a replacement safe so the things that matter most are protected for generations to come; US based customer service for product-related questions and services

specifications.Included Components: Sentrysafe Sfw123Dsb Combination Fire-Safe, Owner's Instruction Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,709 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
